## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-stackmaplivenessanalysis-cpp-/stackmapliveness">StackMapLiveness</a></>}>
This pass calculates the liveness information for each basic block in a function and attaches the register live-out information to a patchpoint intrinsic if present. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-stackmaplivenessanalysis-cpp-/stackmapliveness/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass calculates the liveness information for each basic block in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a function and attaches the register live-out information to a patchpoint</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// intrinsic if present.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass can be disabled via the -enable-patchpoint-liveness=false flag.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The pass skips functions that don&#39;t have any patchpoint intrinsics. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// information provided by this pass is optional and not required by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// aformentioned intrinsic to function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-stackmaplivenessanalysis-cpp-/stackmapliveness"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-stackmaplivenessanalysis-cpp-/stackmapliveness/#a656c3afa2f5de7c8f89475562af7180e">StackMapLiveness</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a register mask and initialize it with the registers from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// register live set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t &#42;StackMapLiveness::createRegisterMask(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The mask is owned and cleaned up by the Machine Function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a6cba8c24b1495a6caff37e5e6df77aa2">allocateRegMask</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> : LiveRegs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> / 32&#93; |= 1U &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> % 32);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;adjustStackMapLiveOutMask(Mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
